I am looking for any suggestions on how to discretize the output from 
a CP=
PN into finite elements.. You know that a CPPN's output is 
actually smooth=
 and has infinite resolution.. an example is the robot 
morphology problem =
(as I remember from you paper). Perhaps a treshold 
(say if the output is >=
0.5 - there is material, else - there is not) 
could handle this? 

Peter

=
